tasks.title: Fix a bug in the login feature
tasks.description: Investigate and resolve an issue where users are unable to log in with valid credentials.

tasks.title: Optimize database queries
tasks.description: Improve the performance of SQL queries for the analytics dashboard to reduce loading times.

tasks.title: Implement dark mode
tasks.description: Add a toggle for dark mode to the application and ensure compatibility with existing themes.

tasks.title: Refactor authentication module
tasks.description: Clean up the codebase for the authentication module to improve maintainability and readability.

tasks.title: Write unit tests for API endpoints
tasks.description: Create comprehensive unit tests for all REST API endpoints to ensure reliability and prevent regressions.

tasks.title: Update third-party libraries
tasks.description: Upgrade outdated npm and pip packages to the latest stable versions and test for compatibility.

tasks.title: Code review for team member's pull request
tasks.description: Review the code changes in the latest pull request and provide feedback on improvements.

tasks.title: Debug email notifications
tasks.description: Identify and resolve the issue causing email notifications to fail for certain users.

tasks.title: Document API usage
tasks.description: Write detailed documentation for the public API, including usage examples and common errors.

tasks.title: Set up CI/CD pipeline
tasks.description: Configure a continuous integration and delivery pipeline for automated testing and deployment.

tasks.title: Migrate legacy code to new framework
tasks.description: Port functionality from the old framework to the new one, ensuring feature parity.

tasks.title: Conduct a security audit
tasks.description: Perform a comprehensive security audit to identify and fix vulnerabilities in the application.

tasks.title: Design a RESTful API for the new feature
tasks.description: Create specifications and endpoints for the new feature to align with RESTful principles.

tasks.title: Prepare for sprint planning
tasks.description: Analyze current progress and prepare a list of tasks for the upcoming sprint planning meeting.

tasks.title: Implement data caching
tasks.description: Add caching for frequently accessed data to improve the application's performance.
